main_definition: To communicate information, a story or an experience verbally to someone else.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To inform or share information with someone
meanings_and_examples.example: I'll tell you about my trip to Italy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To express something in a way that is clear and understandable
meanings_and_examples.example: He told the joke so well that everyone laughed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To reveal or disclose information that was previously unknown or secret
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to tell her friend about her surprise party plans.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To narrate a story or an event, often in a detailed manner
meanings_and_examples.example: The author will tell us the entire history of the kingdom through his book.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give advice or instructions to someone else
meanings_and_examples.example: My mom told me not to eat too much sugar before bedtime.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports, when a player passes the ball to another player on their team
meanings_and_examples.example: He passed the ball to his teammate who scored the winning goal.
